item.title: 燃料成本导致匈牙利通胀率降幅超过预期
item.description: 由于福林走强有助于抑制能源价格，匈牙利 3 月份通胀率降幅超过预期，这是自 9 月份以来的首次下降。【原文：Hungary’s inflation rate dropped more than forecast in March, the first decrease since September as a stronger forint helped curb energy prices.】

item.title: 有影响力的中国博主发布选项回击特朗普
item.description: 两位颇具影响力的中国博主发布了一套相同的措施，政府正在酝酿这些措施，以回击美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的最新关税威胁，包括对美国农产品征税和禁止好莱坞电影。【原文：Two influential Chinese bloggers posted an identical set of measures that authorities are mulling to hit back at the latest tariff threats from US President Donald Trump, including levies on American farm goods and a ban on Hollywood movies.】

item.title: 世界突然有了美国国债的合理替代品
item.description: 在多年来首次出现的投资避风港热潮中，美国国债作为全球资金的目的地正面临着激烈的竞争。【原文：In the first rush for investment safe havens in years, US Treasury bonds are facing serious competition as a destination for global funds.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市受关税影响大跌后将反弹
澳大利亚计划升级煤电厂以延长寿命
item.description: 澳大利亚昆士兰州政府表示，将对原计划于 2028 年关闭的一座煤炭发电站的机组进行升级改造，并评估其使用寿命。【原文：Australia’s Queensland will upgrade units of a coal power station originally planned for closure in 2028 and assess its lifespan, according to the state government.】

item.title: 高盛称 "极端 "情况下石油可能跌破 40 美元
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc. — 刚在一周内两次下调石油预测— 表示，在贸易战爆发和供应增加的 "极端 "情况下，布伦特油价有可能跌破每桶40美元。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. — fresh from cutting oil forecasts twice in a week — said Brent has the outside potential to fall below $40 a barrel under “extreme” outcomes as the trade war flares and supplies rise.】

item.title: 关税紧张引发市场波动，停牌成为焦点
item.description: 世界最大的两个经济体之间可能爆发长期关税战，这使亚洲很少使用的贸易停顿机制成为焦点，凸显了波动性的上升。【原文：The potential for a prolonged tariff war between the world’s two largest economies is putting Asia’s rarely used trading halt mechanisms in focus, underscoring rising volatility.】

item.title: 东南亚股市因关税挤压投资者而下挫
item.description: 由于担心贸易战将损害该地区的经济，投资者纷纷逃离风险较高的资产，东南亚股市暴跌。【原文：Southeast Asian equity markets plunged as investors fled riskier assets on concerns that a trade war will hurt the region’s economies.】

item.title: 狂躁的周一看起来像是开始的结束
item.description:
雷曼危机中也有过喘息的机会，但低点还在数月之后。【原文：

There was a breather in the Lehman crisis, too, but the low was months away.

】

item.title: 伊朗扩大铀矿开采预示着更大储量
item.description: 根据核监察机构的最新数据，伊朗表示其铀金属储量大大高于之前的估计，因此正在扩大铀生产。【原文：Iran is expanding uranium production after indicating that it has significantly higher reserves of the metal than previously estimated, according to the latest nuclear-watchdog data.】

item.title: 日本任命经济大臣领导与美国的关税谈判
item.description: 日本内阁官房长官林芳正表示，在日本努力寻求特朗普政府的缓和之际，日本选择了经济振兴大臣赤泽亮世领导与美国的关税谈判。【原文：Japan selected its economic revitalization minister Ryosei Akazawa to lead tariff negotiations with the US as it scrambles to seek a reprieve from the Trump administration, according to Chief Cabinet Secretary Yoshimasa Hayashi.】

item.title: 印尼将派财政部长和经济部长参加美国贸易谈判
item.description: 下周，印尼将派出包括资深财政部长斯里-穆利亚尼-英德拉瓦蒂（Sri Mulyani Indrawati）在内的一个团队前往华盛顿特区参加贸易谈判，这是该东南亚国家对美国提高关税使其成为全球受冲击最严重经济体的初步回应。【原文：Indonesia will send a team including veteran Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati to Washington D.C. for trade talks next week, part of the Southeast Asian nation’s initial response to being among the hardest hit economies globally by higher US tariffs.】

item.title: 中国敦促谢因停止关税后的供应链转移
item.description: 快时尚巨头Shein将部分生产转移出中国的计划遭到了中国政府的反对，熟悉内情的人士称，面对唐纳德-特朗普不断升级的关税，中国政府正努力避免制造业外流。【原文：Fast-fashion giant Shein’s plans to shift some production out of China has met with opposition from the Chinese government, people familiar with the matter say, as Beijing seeks to stave off a manufacturing exodus in the face of Donald Trump’s escalating tariffs.】

item.title: 越南高级官员赶赴华盛顿参加贸易谈判
item.description: 越南的一位高级官员周一匆忙赶往华盛顿参加最后一分钟的会议，因为这个东南亚国家正在进行第 11 小时的努力，以降低美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收的最高关税税率之一。【原文：One of Vietnam’s top officials hurried to Washington on Monday for last-minute meetings as the Southeast Asian nation makes an 11th-hour case to blunt one of the highest tariff rates imposed by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 新西兰任命霍克斯比为央行行长，任期六个月
item.description: 新西兰央行将由克里斯蒂安-霍克斯比（Christian Hawkesby）担任行长，任期最初为六个月，同时寻找永久行长。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank will be helmed by Christian Hawkesby for an initial period of six months while the search for a permanent governor takes place.】

item.title: Shriram Finance 申请 RBI 许可承销政府债务
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度最大的影子贷款机构之一 Shriram Finance Ltd. 正在寻求加入为政府债务提供承保的特定机构行列。【原文：Shriram Finance Ltd., one of the largest shadow lenders in India, is seeking to join a select group of entities which underwrite government debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: IBM 推出新主机，希望部分数据留在本地
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（International Business Machines Corp. ）发布了其最新的大型机系统，并表示大部分业务数据将保留在客户拥有的服务器上，永远不会托管到云端。【原文：International Business Machines Corp. unveiled its latest mainframe system, saying that a chunk of business data will remain on customer-owned servers and never be hosted on the cloud.】

item.title: 人工智能防御初创公司赫尔辛因技术和战术遭抨击
item.description:
欧洲最大的国防科技公司正面临无人机价格过高和软件故障的指控。该公司坚持自己的产品。【原文：

Europe’s biggest defense tech company is facing allegations of overpriced drones and glitchy software. The firm stands by its products.

】

item.title: 印度基金在周一全球股市崩盘之际买入接近创纪录的股票
item.description: 印度股市周一迎来了国内基金近乎创纪录的买盘，在亚洲股市创下历史最差交易日的当天，帮助减轻了对当地市场的打击。【原文：Indian equities saw near-record buying by domestic funds Monday, helping cushion the blow to local markets on a day when Asian stocks marked their worst-ever session.】

item.title: 关税恐慌继续笼罩市场，越南股市下滑
item.description: 越南股市在周一假期后重新开盘后暴跌，在对美国关税的担忧中继续下挫。【原文：Vietnam’s stocks plunged after the market reopened following Monday’s holiday, continuing their selloff amid concerns over US tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普对加拿大征收关税招致黑脚部落成员起诉
item.description: 蒙大拿州的两名美国原住民请求法院阻止唐纳德-特朗普总统对加拿大征收关税，或至少免除部落成员的关税。【原文：Two Native Americans in Montana asked a court to block President Donald Trump’s tariffs on Canada, or at least exempt tribal members from having to pay them.】

item.title: 安瓦尔称东盟将派官员赴美讨论关税问题
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）表示，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统推出全球关税之后，马来西亚和东南亚国家联盟（Association of Southeast Asian Nations）的合作伙伴将派遣官员前往华盛顿特区进行会谈。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said his country and Association of Southeast Asian Nations partners will dispatch officials to Washington D.C. for talks following President Donald Trump’s rollout of global tariffs.】

item.title: 贸易战加剧，中国农业部门为关税做好准备
item.description: 中国对美国农产品加征关税将考验两国的农业部门。【原文：Chinese tariffs on US agricultural goods will test the farm sectors of both nations.】

item.title: 尽管亚洲股市出现缓解性反弹，但市场仍处于紧张状态
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 关税动荡给印度央行带来采取行动的压力：利率决策指南
item.description: 印度央行预计将于周三降息，与此同时美国的进口关税也将生效，投资者将面临更多的市场动荡，印度央行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）可能会采取更有力的措施来支持经济，防止经济放缓。【原文：India’s central bank is expected to cut interest rates on Wednesday around the same time US import tariffs take effect, with investors primed for more market turmoil and the possibility Governor Sanjay Malhotra will take stronger steps to bolster the economy against a slowdown.】

item.title: 德意志银行经济学家首次呼吁澳大利亚央行五月降息幅度过大
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）预计，澳大利亚决策者将在下个月将关键利率大幅下调 50 个基点，理由是华盛顿的新关税制度将对企业和消费者信心以及国内经济增长产生影响。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG expects Australian policymakers will cut their key interest rate by an outsized 50-basis points next month, citing the impact on business and consumer confidence and domestic economic growth from Washington’s new tariff regime.】

item.title: 韩国希望增加能源进口以削减对美顺差
item.description: 韩国一位高级贸易官员表示，韩国政府正在审查向特朗普政府提交的多个一揽子方案，以减少对美贸易顺差，争取通过谈判降低关税率。【原文：A top South Korean trade official said the government is reviewing multiple packages to present to the Trump administration as it seeks to reduce a trade surplus with the US in a bid to negotiate a lower tariff rate.】

item.title: 关税激怒市场，中国交易员加大货币宽松押注
item.description: 由于与美国的贸易紧张局势升级，交易员们迅速将中国加快宽松政策的可能性计价，从而推动此类押注的一个关键指标创下五年来最大跌幅，并逼近2008年以来的最低点。【原文：Traders are rapidly pricing in faster easing in China as trade tensions with the US escalated, pushing down a key gauge for such bets to drop the most in five years and inch closer to the lowest since 2008.】

item.title: 国家基金介入，中国股市从历史性暴跌中反弹
item.description: 中国股市在周一大幅下挫后出现反弹，原因是被称为 "国家队 "的一批国有关联基金斥资收购资产，而且央行承诺提供贷款帮助稳定市场。【原文：China’s stock market rebounded after a steep selloff on Monday, as a group of state-linked funds known as the national team scooped up assets and the central bank promised loans to help stabilize the market.】

item.title: 新西兰称美国关税使经济复苏更加艰难
item.description: 新西兰表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）全面征收关税可能会抑制全球对新西兰商品的需求，这使得新西兰从衰退中复苏变得更加困难。【原文：New Zealand said its recovery from recession has been made more difficult by US President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs as they are likely to damp global demand for its goods.】
